body:
Followed the instructions to the letter. Seems to be an nvcc error?
1st error:
```
Building Custom Rule C:/optimae/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/CMakeLists.txt
  CMake does not need to re-run because C:/optimae/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/generate.stamp is u
  p-to-date.
  Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/Release/ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.obj
  CMake Error at ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.obj.cmake:207 (message):
    Error generating
    C:/optimae/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/Release/ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUt
  ils.cu.obj


C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\BuildTools\Common7\IDE\VC\VCTargets\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(171
,5): error MSB6006: "cmd.exe" exited with code 1. [C:\optimae\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj]
```
2nd error:
```
"C:\optimae\pytorch\torch\lib\build\libshm_windows\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->

  C:\optimae\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows\core.cpp(5): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'TH/TH.h': No s
uch file or directory [C:\optimae\pytorch\torch\lib\build\libshm_windows\shm.vcxproj]

    0 Warning(s)
    1 Error(s)
```
